backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining Veda and language types, mantra data storage, comparison logic, queries, and audio upload support using blob-storage.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including hooks, components, styles, and documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide explaining prerequisites, setup steps, and instructions for deploying the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and styles defining light and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style rule routing all paths to index.html for SPA behavior.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page redirecting deep links to index.html while preserving the original path via a redirect query.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features, live URL placeholder, canister IDs, tech stack, and deployment reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application handling routing, deep links, dropdown state, data fetching, and rendering mantra content.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Component providing audio playback and authenticated upload functionality with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Splits metadata text into tokens and highlights tokens ending with ':' using a styled span.
frontend/src/components/ShareArea.tsx: Provides a UI card showing the current page URL with a button to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching mantra numbers, text, meaning, metadata, and audio through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark color palettes and metadata label styling using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/selectValueGuards.ts: Provides utility functions to validate Select values and ensure bigint selections are positive.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, components, and plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, existing features, and pending requests related to deployment and sharing.
